name: Bird and the Worm
description:
hello.

have you ever wondered what birds do all day? Kookaburras just sit in trees- what do they contemplate?

If the answer is no; sorry, i have worms that may interest you however. and really good drawings.

maybe you are a history buff, when i think this character is sort of like napoleon, so thats why you should play. maybe closer to shre(©)k.

theres a love interest for all you rom com fans out there.

also theres really cool music (https://soundcloud.com/nathan-culshaw/sets/flight).

dialogue is average though.

you should play this game. do you have a choice?

you dont want to miss out on a great story, do you?

you wouldnt want to be the last in your friend circle to play the game, and become the laughing stock of the world, would you? (this is going global mark my words)

if any of that interests you, play the game. if it doesn,t play the game.

thanks,

management, :) .

Thanks:

Meghann O'Neill

p.s you scrolled past the game to get here. scroll up. click "click the text" to play :)
